AWS Services

AWS provides various services to launch resources in a private cloud, establish dedicated network connections, manage applications, and analyze user behavior. These services include VPC, Direct Connect, Route 53, EC2, Elastic Beanstalk, Lambda, ECS, Mobile Hub, Device Farm, SNS, Cognito, and Mobile Analytics.

AWS VPC Direct Connect Route 53 EC2 Elastic Beanstalk Lambda EC2 Container Service Mobile Hub Device Farm
